A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Beautiful looking but empty & full of cheap tricks\, like someone you find incredibly sexy looking until they open their mouth and their brains vomit a vapid lack of intelligence or personality aside from a few regurgitated one-liners they happened to remember. Such pathetic one-note emo villain lacking any intimidation\, dependent on his pouty petulant resting bitch face...So many lost opportunities and uninspired storytelling\, such a mind-numbing disappointment from Rian Johnson who held so much promise.
